select distinct sys_role.id, sys_role.role_name, sys_role.role_key, sys_role.role_sort, sys_role.data_scope, sys_role.menu_check_strictly, sys_role.dept_check_strictly, sys_role.status, sys_role.create_user, sys_role.create_time, sys_role.update_user, sys_role.update_time,sys_role.remark from sys_role left join sys_user_role on sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id left join sys_user on sys_user.user_id = sys_user_role.user_id left join sys_dept dept on sys_user.dept_id = sys_dept.dept_id where sys_role.delete_time = '1970-01-01 00:00:00'
AND sys_role.id = #{id}
AND sys_role.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
AND sys_role.status = #{status}
AND sys_role.role_key like concat('%', #{roleKey}, '%')
and date_format(sys_role.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(sys_role.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
${dataScopeSql} order by sys_role.role_sort
